data.title: Laura Lee Biography, Net Worth, Spouse & Other Interesting Facts
data.meta_description: Before fame, Laura Lee worked in multiple places to make ends meet. She previously taught at a school as a preschool teacher and also served as a medical
data.text:
Before fame, Laura Lee worked in multiple places to make ends meet. She previously taught at a school as a preschool teacher and also served as a medical assistant for an Alabama-based dermatologist.

While his stints at the aforementioned places of work lasted, Lee was nowhere near stardom. Her big break, however, came when she finally switched her focus to the internet. Today, it evolves at the rate of many sensations related to the Internet and is a source of inspiration for many young people who find it difficult to embark on commerce on the Internet.

Lee’s success story is very interesting. She started by sharing her makeup photos with her Instagram friends. Soon after, she started getting requests from people to create tutorial videos. Over time, precisely in 2013, Laura decided to devote herself entirely to the Internet sector. She would start by uploading makeup videos as well as makeup tutorials and hacks and even product reviews.

Biography of Laura Lee

The multi-talented personality was born in Alabama, USA on September 1, 1988, under the zodiac sign Virgo. She is American by nationality and has Caucasian roots. She was raised in Montgomery, Alabama with her older sister Ashley Lee and brother.

Further details about the professional makeup artist’s family background, childhood, school performance and childhood are not available at this time.

Laura Lee is a very famous Youtube blogger who focuses on makeup, her daily life, her family and new trends. She is known as a makeup guru, YouTube blogger, and makeup influencer. With more than 5 million subscribers on her channel, she has always managed to win the hearts of her fans with all the efforts she puts in to satisfy them. In order to start her Youtube channel, she also worked as a medical assistant in her hometown for a dermatologist as mentioned earlier.

Who is his wife?

Simply put, Lee and her husband are couple goals! Their relationship is best described as the cutest thing on the internet right now. The social media personality’s husband is none other than Tyler Williams. The couple have been together for 10 years and counting, however, they tied the knot in 2015, a year after Williams graduated.

The lovers became friends through health insurance while in high school, they didn’t become close friends until their senior year and the two have remained inseparable ever since. The pair got engaged in 2012 and ended up tying the knot three years later. According to Laura, their marriage took so long after their engagement because Williams was still in college. Lee’s husband graduated in May 2014 and earned a degree in industrial engineering. The lovers celebrated their 10th anniversary on January 10, 2018.

What is his net worth?

Laura Lee is undoubtedly one of the best makeup artists on YouTube. In truth, his talent, creativity, commitment and dedication have been very rewarding. She is said to have an estimated net worth of over $350,000.

The Alabama-born makeup artist earns her living from multiple business channels. She has her own shade of lipstick with Mac cosmetics. Lee has her own makeup line called Laura Lee Los Angeles. A remarkable businesswoman, she released three liquid lipsticks, an eyeliner and several eye shadow palettes.

Other interesting facts about YouTube Star

1. In October 2014, the beauty blogger was listed by Star Central magazine in the Beauty Guru of the Month category.

2. In 2016, she collaborated with Violet Voss on an eyeshadow palette. The same year, she reunited with Benefit Cosmetic Benefit Island Collection solely on eyebrow pencil.

3. The makeup artist also appeared on The Today Show to promote her makeup brand.

4. She is 5 feet 2 inches tall, which equals 1.5748 in metric units or 157.48 in centimeters.

5. Lee’s YouTube channel has lots of amazing videos, including one titled “15 Heat-Free Back-to-School Hairstyles.” The video garnered over 2.5 million views in less than two months after its release.

6. The beauty blogger first introduced her husband to her fans in 2015 in a video titled “The Husband Tag | Meet my husband. “
